channel.title: FLF - Open Mike with Michael Thiessen
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.

item.title: Biblical Manhood ft. Pastor Michael Foster [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ June 02, 2023
On this episode of Open Mike, Dr. Thiessen is joined by Michael Foster, Pastor at East River Church and author of It's Good to Be a Man, to talk about biblical manhood and what it means in an androgynous age. 

Episode Resource: It's Good to Be a Man Website: https://itsgoodtobeaman.com/; It's Good to Be a Man Book: https://book.itsgoodtobeaman.com/; Michael's Twitter Page: https://twitter.com/thisisfoster; East River Church: https://eastriverchurch.org/. 

JOIN PASTORS, CHURCHES, AND CHRISTIAN COMMUNITIES ACROSS CANADA WITH LCC'S NEWEST INITIATIVE, "TRUE READINGS FROM TRUE ROYALTY." 
Sign up today: https://libertycoalitioncanada.com/storyhour/

item.title: Living Under the Lordship of Christ ft. Pastor Dale Partridge [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ May 27, 2023

On this episode of Open Mike, Dr. Thiessen is joined by Dale Partridge, Pastor at King’s Way Bible Church, author of numerous books, founder of Relearn Ministries, and host of the Real Christianity podcast, to talk about what it means to live under the lordship of Christ in every area of life.

Episode Resource: Relearn Ministries: http://Relearn.org; Get all of Dale's Books here: https://shop.relearn.org/collections/books; Dale's Twitter Page: https://twitter.com/dalepartridge.

SUPPORT FOR HAROLD JONKER'S DEFENCE FUND: https://givesendgo.com/TruckersLegalSupport?utm_source=sharelink&utm_medium=copy_link&utm_campaign=TruckersLegalSupport;
